channel.title: Style on Professor
channel.description: Recent content in Style on Professor

item.title: Style your site colors
item.description: You can totally customize your site’s theme colors within minutes of creating a new site. Read on to find out how, and decide which of the three options meets your needs. Use a color theme Hugo Ap√©ro includes 8 built-in color themes that work “out of the box.” This means you can use a color theme to quickly customize the look of your site without needing to write any CSS. You can select the color theme in your config.

item.title: What drives student Motivation?
item.description: Motivation is an innate concept, that is both hard and simple to define. Simply, it is why we do what we do. Yet, what drives motivation, the reason behind the why, is significantly more complex. Despite the singular name for motivation, it is not a singular entity; Motivation is highly varied between individuals. While some might value the praise and pride that comes with academic achievement, others simply do not care about it.
